content: this written pattern contains instructions for heart shaped appliques in three different sizes 2 3 5 and 4 5 each one is made of a single piece worked in the round note this pattern was re-released and the link updated on february 12 2023 the pattern previously called for an h hook which resulted in a large heart measuring 5 in diameter the updated version calls for a g hook and results in the large heart measuring 4 5 an h hook can be used with the new version to create a larger heart
